duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform detailed evaluations of Tillamook products using the five senses.
Record descriptive data entry of product evaluations.
Operate a forklift and lift large blocks of cheese as needed.
Collaborate closely with valued team members.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma, GED, or equivalent work experience.
Pre-work physical exam and sensory sensitivity testing are required.
Experience in a CPG, food, or beverage manufacturing environment is a plus.
